programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY 39 Superfight Series is headlined by a Lightweight title fight as champion Sittichai defends his crown against Dylan Salvador.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Recently crowned champion Cedric Doumbe puts his title on the line against Yoann Kongolo who has beaten Doumbe twice before. Plus four featherweights compete in the GLORY 39 Featherweight tournament.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Jason 'Psycho' Wilnis puts his belt back on the line against the man he took it from in 2016: Canada's Simon 'The ONE' Marcus.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven returns in a non-title match-up against former Enfusion heavyweight champion Ismael Lazaar.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 41 features a heavyweight tournament with the likes of Anderson Silva, D'Angelo Marshall, Mohamed Abdallah and Giannis Stoforidis. Plus a heavyweight matchup between Hesdy Gerges and Tomáš Hron.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 45 Superfight Series: on September 30, 2017 at the Sporthallen Zuid in Amsterdam, Netherlands. This event features fights from Jason Wilnis, Yousri Belgaroui, Zouggary, Glunder, Beztati, Danenberg and Koprivlenski.
